And try another watch face.This watchface is designed for Android Wear Rectangle Watch like following devices.- ZenWatch (ASUS)- Gear Live (SAMSUNG)- G Watch (LG)- SmartWatch3 (SONY)Tested with LG G Watch,Samsung Gear Live*Smartphone and Android Wear must be paired before you use it.More watch faces- Visit our exclusive watchface collection for Android Wear on the Play Store http://goo.gl/RITByg[NOTICE]If you have a question,plsease contact our email address in English.
descriptionHTML:
Custom watch face for Android Wear

Message from A15 designer
- I've arranged luxuriously four analog board.It's including 24 hours clock ,month board,date board,,day of the week board.
- It is the design which had stylish face and useful digital display!

Features
- Awesome designer's watch face for you.
- Simple but useful design face! Designed by professional designer.
- Privileges for initial release
Both packaged.
1.Rectangle design for Samsung Gear Live,G Watch
2.Round design for Moto360

More watch faces
- Visit our exclusive watchface collections for Android Wear on the Play Store
http://goo.gl/58kqxS

For Android 6.0(and higher) phone users
Need to do following setup procedure after installation.
http://androidwearface.com/for_android6_users/

Installation
It will be installed on your watch automatically from your phone paired with your watch after a short time and please wait.
After installation,you can choose the watch face from the setting menu.
Or just long tap on the current watch face screen,so watch face selector screen will open.

Please note
- If you don't like this model please cancel your order in 15 minutes. And try another watch face.

This watchface is designed for Android Wear Rectangle Watch like following devices.
- ZenWatch (ASUS)
- Gear Live (SAMSUNG)
- G Watch (LG)
- SmartWatch3 (SONY)

Tested with LG G Watch,Samsung Gear Live

*Smartphone and Android Wear must be paired before you use it.

More watch faces
- Visit our exclusive watchface collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
http://goo.gl/RITByg

[NOTICE]
If you have a question,plsease contact our email address in English.
comments: fixed Has been fixed and it works great on moto 360. Update: does not work Huawei watch.
Looks good but... A15 you can't format the date to MM-DD or format time to non-military.  Also no weather integration.  Otherwise, decent looking.
Low graphic quality on G Watch Low graphic quality on G Watch. A too busy display. Dim mode is busy too.

Love the face...hate the battery drain I put this on my watch at 7pm it's 8:55 now and my battery went from 50% to dead in less than 2 hours. Needs a sleep display badly or I'll just have to turn "always on" off.
Neat! Love it, but would like a dimmed screen with less clutter on it - maybe just the hands?
Error Not connected to SmartWatch 2, and when I want to refund appears an error and  can't make it
